headline: KKR Mulls $5.05 Billion Equity Investment in Thames Water, Bloomberg Says, Citing Sources
summary: U.S. investment company KKR & Co. is looking to invest around 4 billion pounds for an equity stake in debt-laden water utility Thames Water, Bloomberg reports citing unnamed sources. --KKR...

summary: U.S. private equity group KKR has offered nearly 4 billion pounds to Britain's Thames Water for a majority stake in the utility, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the...
